channel.title: Our Project on iFetch | MultiModal Conversational Agents
channel.description: Recent content in Our Project on iFetch | MultiModal Conversational Agents

item.title: Project Information
item.description: Objectives iFetch proposes to research and deliver a new generation of task-oriented conversational agents that interact with users using verbal and visual information in a seamless manner. Through the conversation, iFetch must provide targeted advice and “physical store-like” experience while maintaining user engagement.
